column3: School of Social Sciences, Education and Social Work
column5: This programme was developed in consultation with the education, health and social care, and voluntary sectors, as well as individuals affected by Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD), and is designed to facilitate the professional development of teachers and other related professionals who work, or wish to work, in this area.The course can be taken fully online or in a hybrid online/on-campus mode.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
